knimeNode.name: Tree Ensemble Predictor
knimeNode.shortDescription: Predicts patterns according to a majority vote in a tree ensemble model.

fullDescription.intro: Learns an ensemble of decision trees (such as random forest variants).
fullDescription.option: Select the column containing the value to be learned. Rows with missing values in this column will be ignored during the learning process.

ports.inPort: The data to learn from. It must contain at least one nominal target column and either a fingerprint (bitvector) column or another numeric or nominal column.
